dialogues.text:
Analyzing environment...
Impact zone: cave network.
Do you want me to save this new environment data?
Yeah.. I can't believe you have lost all your previous data..

Tutorial information!
The suit is capable to keep you away from damage and increase your kinetic energy 
is recommended to pass through this cave environment.

Oh, great.. now is giving me tips like
I was a rookie...

Remember: after using an ability, the system
needs to recharge before a new use.
The suitâ€™s charge status is visible on your interface.
